Hear about useful tools and considerations, and get the answer why reproducible research does not only benefit others, but first and foremost yourself. 

This session we will give a presentation and introduce the concept of reproducible research together with a variety of different tools that can help you gettting started. 
 
**Preparation:** No preparations needed. Come, listen, and take notes!
 

**When:** Monday May 20th, 09:45 \
**Where:** Campus ULTUNA, VHC, floor 5, room Tanngrisner 1\
or via **[Zoom](https://slu-se.zoom.us/j/69486568642)** (Password: 410 410)

The lecture will be  available on [Github](https://github.com/SLUBioinformaticsInfrastructure/Three_Bees_Workshop_Series) after the session.
